name: topic_topic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uncovered_treasure.
Tool description: The Uncovered Treasure API has more than 25,000 revealed truths from every Book and chapter in the Bible as recorded by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.
API description: Fetches entries from a specific topic using the Uncovered Treasure API.

topic.description: The topic for which to fetch entries.

callback.description: The optional JSONP callback function name.
